Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive Tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Jessica Strizzi
Summary: Grants retroactive Tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Jessica Strizzi.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership with tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Jessica Strizzi
